name: Electruns
description:
Electruns is a game designed to teach basic circuitry in a bright and interactive way.

Control the Conductor and Insulator characters to give this circuitry Watt for.

Music Used: https://www.youtube.com/user/HeatleyBros

Assets Used: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/particles-effects/simple-fade-scene-...
